overview: The inside story of one human soul, wrestling with the ultimate decision.  A dilemma is posed and a battle ensues. One-by-one the power brokers of the soul Mind, Memory, Emotion, Heart, Will, and Conscience step forward to weigh in. The stakes couldnâ€™t be higher. The outcome has consequences for eternity.
tagline: The meeting has come to order. The battle has begun. The verdict impacts eternity.
title: The Board
